definitions.definition: A small nocturnal insect pest of humans, of species Cimex lectularius ( common bedbug ) and Cimex hemipterus ( tropical bedbug ) that feeds on the blood of humans during sleep.
examples: Fiona rapidly discovered that the hotel was infested with bedbugs .

definitions.definition: Any similar insect of family Cimicidae , that feeds on the blood of humans and certain other warm-blooded animals.

main_definition: A small nocturnal insect pest of humans, of species Cimex lectularius ( common bedbug ) and Cimex hemipterus ( tropical bedbug ) that feeds on the blood of humans during sleep.
secondary_definitions: Any similar insect of family Cimicidae , that feeds on the blood of humans and certain other warm-blooded animals.
